strapiPost.title: Razorback Athletics Reports Record Revenue
strapiPost.content:
For the first time ever, the University of Arkansas athletics department has topped $150m in annual revenue. 

  • The big two: Nearly 70% of the department’s revenue came from football and men’s basketball, the only two sports to turn a profit. 
  • Bouncing back: Ticket sales were a huge driver in the revenue increase, making a huge recovery after ticket sales dropped 121% during the pandemic.
